doc.field: Record Group 17. Digital formats (1989-2013, undated; 4.5 linear feet)
Record Group 17. Digital formats (1989-2013, undated; 4.5 linear feet)

This record group contains digital formats, including CDs, DVDs, floppy disks, and Digital Audio Tape (DAT). Content includes audiovisual recordings, digital photographs, and other documents. Please note that because of the volume, not every CD or other carrier was described here, though the the files were preserved and will be found in the virtual "box" noted in Subseries I.A.
